item.description:
For those of you who are not attending Tonya's Award Winning Event with Trivia at Coogan's, here is an alternative Happy Hour option.

Once again several meetup groups are joining forces to gather at Sagra in Davis Square at 7pm for an informal Happy Hour. Sagra is located 1 short block from the Red Line Station. Some of those groups include my Red Sox Natives, the Skidaddlers Ski and Sports Club, Social Fun, and The Booze Club. Some of us will be there earlier in the evening for another event.

Everyone is welcome. Last time we did this over 30 people showed up.

Cost is free except for what you drink and/or eat.

Please remember to maintain your own bar tab or pay in cash.

We will all be at the bar. Ask for Kathy B.
item.name: Alternative Happy Hour with Multiple Groups at Sagra
